description: Number of n-input 2-output switching networks under action of symmetric group S(n) on the inputs and complementing group C(2,2) on the outputs.
references: M. A. Harrison, On the number of classes of switching networks, J. Franklin Instit., 276 (1963), 313-327.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to switching networks
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
